column1: Uchi////Was highly disappointed by the reviews. First there was no mention of reservations. Second we were told it was a 45-1 hour wait
column2: but after an hour and a half we were still not seated. After asking about the wait time again they could not give us an answer. A few people walked in later without reservations and were seated before us. Third
column3: we waited about 45 minutes to get a drink menu from the hostess
column4: and when i walked up to ask for one she said that she had no idea we were waiting.... Lastly
column5: after not being seated we decided to leave and eat somewhere since we couldn't even get an explanation of how much longer it would be
column6: the hostess didn't seem to care.
